Please edit me!!!!!

This great app allows you to track and edit and everything on it! Instantly change your content from all your devices. This app instantly stores any content you change in some mysterious database(just kidding, it's with google), meaning you can change what your customers see anytime.

About this app!!

Whether you're on the go, or at your computer, you can access all your Clipboard snippets in a few simple clicks. Ensure sensitive information never makes its way to your clipboard

  • Quick Search
  • Easily change your paragraphs by finding the right column in the sheet.
  • Google Sheet Syncing
  • Instantly saves and syncs snippets across all your devices.

Clone here!!
